title: Emails Show Omaha Police Planned Deal With Far Right-linked Gun Shop
description: The Omaha Police Department (OPD) in Nebraska plans to trade tens of thousands of dollars' worth of expired helmets and bulletproof gear for roughly $3,000 worth of firearm equipment in a deal with a local tactical shop that has hosted international far-right politicians and an anti-Muslim speaker.
dc:creator: Creede Newton
